title.rendered: John Pope | Head of Project Cargo Services (Europe)

content.rendered:
John is a Naval Architect & Marine Engineer Surveyor with over 38 years of surveying experience. John is a Chartered Engineer with an honours degree in Ship Science. John has experience with a leading classification society as a staff surveyor, experience as a marine consultant including new builds, conversions and repairs. He has extensive survey experience with most types of ships as well as yachts, small craft, recreational craft, work boats and fishing vessels. John is able to conduct Hull & Machinery surveys, P&I surveys, fires, damage to fixed & floating objects, marine warranty surveys, project cargos, heavy lifts, towage approvals, collisions, groundings and salvage.

Discipline: Naval Architect / Engineer
Specialism: Naval Architect & Marine Engineer Surveyor
Expert Witness Expertise: Expert opinion – salvage, deck crane failure, steelwork repairs

Contact

London | +44 (0) 7789 003 813
